attributes.additional_details:
The aim of this petition is to ensure that employers do not abuse the zero hour contracts system and that employees have the ability to renegotiate their contracts at any time should their circumstances change without the danger of repurcussions, intimidation or any action taken which may harm the employee.

If you are trapped or tricked into taking a zero hour contract or feel that you have not had any alternatives, then please sign this petition to ensure that your voice is heard and that you are able to renegotiate with your employers at any time.
